name: Caliban Prime
description: Forged in celebration of the all-too-brief peace between the Orokin and Sentients, Caliban Prime is a true collaborative masterpiece. The heir of twin kingdoms arises in royal gold.

abilities.name: Razor Gyre
abilities.description: Dash forward in a spinning vortex of death. Struck enemies are inflicted with <DT_SENTIENT_COLOR>Tau Status Effect, making them more vulnerable to all other status effects. For each enemy hit, recover a portion of the energy cost, as well as health and shields. Enemies lifted by Sentient Wrath take increased damage.

abilities.name: Sentient Wrath
abilities.description: Smash the ground sending out a radial wave of destruction. Those not killed by the initial blast are helplessly raised into the air, where they take amplified damage for a short time.

abilities.name: Lethal Progeny
abilities.description: Cycle through Sentient unit types, then summon them to Caliban's side. Conculysts focus on raw melee damage. Ortholysts specialize in ranged attacks and inflict <DT_SENTIENT_COLOR>Tau Status Effect. Summulysts summon their own Choralysts and provide shield protection for the squad.

abilities.name: Fusion Strike
abilities.description: Converge three streams of raw energy upon a single point, causing a massive explosion. The streams strip armor and shields, and each enemy struck detonates on stream convergence. Summoned Conculysts can wield their own mini Fusion Strikes.

languages.description: Geschmiedet zur Feier des viel zu kurzen Friedens zwischen den Orokin und den Sentients, ist Caliban Prime ein wahres Meisterwerk dieser Zusammenarbeit. Der Erbe eines Zwillingskönigreichs erhebt sich königlichem Gold.
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Forgé pour célébrer la paix bien trop brève entre les Orokins et les Sentients, Caliban Prime est un véritable chef-d'œuvre collaboratif. L'héritier des royaumes jumeaux s'élève dans une tenue dorée royale.
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Forgiato per celebrare la pace fin troppo breve tra Orokin e Sentient, Caliban Prime è un vero capolavoro frutto di una collaborazione. L'erede dei regni gemelli sorge nell'oro reale.
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: 오로킨과 센티언트 사이의 짧았던 평화를 기념하며 제작된 칼리반 프라임은 진정한 협업의 걸작품입니다. 센티언트와 오로킨, 두 왕국의 후계자가 왕실의 황금 속에서 탄생하였습니다.
languages.name: 칼리반 프라임

languages.description: Caliban Prime, forjado para celebrar la breve paz entre los orokin y los conscientes, es una auténtica obra maestra de colaboración. El heredero de los reinos gemelos se levanta cubierto de un majestuoso dorado imperial.
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Caliban Prime 是为了庆祝 Orokin 与 Sentient 之间短暂的和平而打造的，堪称真正的合璧杰作。双生王国的继承者，身披皇家之金崛起。
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Выкованный в честь недолговечного мира между Орокин и Владеющими Разумом, варфрейм «Калибан Прайм» — настоящий шедевр, созданный их совместными усилиями. Наследник королевств-близнецов восстаёт в королевской позолоте.
languages.name: Калибан Прайм

languages.description: かつてあったオロキンとセンティエント間の短すぎる平和な時代、その平和を象徴するため構造されたCaliban Primeの完成度からは、その後の展開を予想できないだろう。二つの王国の後継者が、黄金をまとい君臨する。
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Stworzony na cześć krótkotrwałego rozejmu między Orokin a Świadomymi, Caliban Prime stanowi prawdziwe arcydzieło współpracy cywilizacji. Spadkobierca bliźniaczych królestw powstaje, spowity królewskim złotem.
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Forjado em celebração à breve paz entre os Orokin e os Sentients, o Caliban Prime é uma verdadeira obra-prima colaborativa. O herdeiro dos reinos gêmeos resplandece em ouro real.
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: 為慶祝 Orokin 與 Sentient 之間短暫而珍貴的和平而鍛造，Caliban Prime 正是攜手合作下的傑作。雙界之裔以皇金之姿崛起於世。
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Caliban Prime ถูกสร้างขึ้นมาเพื่อเฉลิมฉลองสันติภาพที่แสนสั้นระหว่าง Orokin กับ Sentients นี่คือผลงานชิ้นเอกแห่งการร่วมมือกันอย่างแท้จริง ทายาทแห่งอาณาจักรคู่แฝดผู้ถือกำเนิดขึ้นมาในร่างทองแห่งราชวงศ์
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Orokin ve Sentient arasındaki kısa süreli barışı kutlamak için yaratılan Caliban Prime, gerçek bir iş birliği şaheseridir. İkiz krallıkların varisi, kraliyet altınları içinde yükselir.
languages.name: Caliban Prime

languages.description: Калібан-прайм — шедевральний результат спільної праці, створений, щоб ушанувати короткочасний мир між орокінами та свідомими. Спадкоємець двох світів сяятиме в королівському золоті.
languages.name: Калібан-прайм
